name: SleepWalk

name: Crazy Hit
description:
Crazy Hit is a game produced by U.F.O. Soft that was released together with Crazy Hit 2 (known as the Playstation Pok√©mon for using unlicensed art from the franchise) and a special controller to play both.

It is currently not possible to find the game or recordings of it available, so the only image of it available is the one on the back of the set's box. From the box art and the description on it (in addition to the use of the controller), it is possible to deduce that it shares the same gameplay as Crazy Hit 2 (a whack-a-mole like game), but without the use of Pok√©mon.

In Crazy Hit 2 it is possible to see on the initial screen that the game was made by Poho and Majorros, however without the file for this game, it is uncertain to say that this game was also produced by both developers.

name: Crazy Hit 2
description:
Crazy Hit 2 is an unlicensed Whack-A-Mole style game for the PlayStation featuring Pok√©mon characters.

The game originally came with a pop'n music-style peripheral called Crazy Hit, manufactured by U.F.O. Soft (who also created the Photo Hunter games), as the game was intended for use with the peripheral (the peripheral also came with two discs specially designed for it; Crazy Hit 1, the other disc, is currently undumped); however, the game could also be played with a normal controller. Possibly due to the branding, Pok√©mon Crazy Hit 2 were later independently released by bootleggers separately from the peripheral.

Due to the homebrew nature of the game, the title is very small by PlayStation standards, weighing at just 5 MB.

Desktop Explorer is an exploration-puzzle game set in a retro-style operating system. Solve puzzles by interacting with built-in software features, immersing yourself into a realistic late 90‚Äôs computer experience.

The game follows a fairly innocent narrative as you progress through it‚Äôs puzzles. However it becomes clear to you that there is more than meets the eye with this machine, as you slowly see its familiar fa√ßade fade away in favor of a darker aesthetic..

name: Supermarket Security Simulator
description:
Welcome to your first day of work at our supermarket.
I know this is your first time working security so listen up.

As security you will have to:
Keep an eye on people so they don't steal, which entails searching old ladies, keep an eye out for gypsies (and not so gypsies) stealing from you.
If a thief tries to flee, don't be afraid to hit him with the truncheon or electrocute him with the taser. Check the ticket and if he has something he didn't buy you handcuff him and put him in the dungeon.
Check the security cameras, which will alert you if they detect someone stealing. They are shitty and sometimes fail, you will have to hit them with the broom to fix them...
Watch out for the trolleys, the old ladies are trying to take them home.
Kids are bastards... Some of them come to eat whatever they want and then they leave the packages empty.
They often come to rob the supermarket, so be alert and when you see a robber you neutralize him with a punch.
You will also have to work at night so don't be afraid and if some robbers come you can shoot them.

description:
Get into Rod's factory and discover its secrets!

After having rescued your three friends from Rod‚Äôs clutches on several occasions, the evil ice cream maker has captured them yet again and, this time round, has taken them to his factory. In the previous installment, J made his own special ice cream with the ingredients your friends had collected to fatten up and let Rod capture him.
In this new chapter, Rod will take you to his factory, where you‚Äôll find out more about both his past and that of the Sullivan family. Explore the different areas of the factory, square up to the ice cream maker‚Äôs mysterious helpers and uncover many more surprises.

Free your friends from their cages before anyone ends up in the extraction room!

name: The Unwanted War
description: Fight battles through human history, defeat your enemies and save humanities future! The Unwanted War lets you follow history itself and take influence on humanities ultimate fate. Are you going to use your knowledge and power for good or will you bring doom over the human race?

Brace yourself for a side-splitting, body-slamming adventure as you go head-to-head with your friends and adversaries in races, king-of-the-hill battles, duels, bowling, golf, and more.

Girl meets boy in this adolescent tale of magic. Your year to seize the future is about to begin!

In search of clues to break the curse that causes her to abruptly transform into an animal, the protagonist decides to study abroad at the Reveal Academy of Magic. Will she be able to break the curse while dealing with all sorts of trouble?

description:
An upcoming otome game by Otomate.

A young lady monk apprentice who lives in Kayuu, a country known for its martial arts, somehow ends up protecting the country!? What is her fate and the future of the country‚Ä¶?

description: Where fun meets chaos: Set in Pixel Vault's mashup universe, step in, apply your strategy and compete in our 3v3 auto-battler.

name: Maido Manie
description: White Rabbit Maid Caf√©, owned by Iiko Shinkaichi, is losing money because there is a better Maid Caf√© next door! What would be a better idea than to send her feminine younger brother to work there as a maid to find out their secrets?

name: Meatball Dog
description: meatball dog is about a dog eating meatballs.

name: Pok√©mon Animon
description: Animon is a pokemon rom hack which replaced every pokemon with anime characters like Digimon, Naruto, One Piece, Dragon Ball, Attack on TItan and many more.

name: Final Girl
description: Final GIrl is a turn based adventure paying tribute to the horror movies from the 80's and 90's. Analyse your environment and choose the right interactions. Be creative and unlock new possibilities ... but don't let usefull tools behind, because the bad guys might use them too!

name: Inventory Master
description: This is a game that focuses on item combination and inventory management. Engage in repeated combinations to aim for the production of top-tier items.

name: Covert Ultra
description: Covert Ultra is an arcade-style tactical shooter, and every level is a lone-wolf terrorist hunt. Play as a high-tech hitman for hire with spider-like abilities and compete to achieve each mission's best time and highest rank. Efficiency is your only priority.

name: Ninja Origin
description: Role-playing game with the best gameplay in the MMORPG series‚Ä¶

name: Vague
description: Vague is a first-person psychological horror inspired by early 2000s classic horror titles. Experience the unsettling atmosphere as you follow Raymond K. Fisher in his search for his missing family.

name: Halloween Night
description: Halloween Night is a magic brew of card games, board games and dark lord simulator set in a cozy Halloween world. Lead fairytale heroes to explore the Halloween Valley. Craft an unbeatable deck, battle fanciful monsters and become their new lord!

name: Necrodepths
description: A Dark Fantasy 2.5D Action RPG with a heavy dark atmospheric aesthetic inspired by the once greats. Character customization reminiscent of open world RPGs. Unique races and classes. An endless random, but meaningful, generation of enemies and dungeons, for everlasting Hack n' Slash gameplay.

name: Volkolak
description: "Volkolak" is a 2D action game in the dark fantasy world. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of the game and explore mysterious caves and catacombs, the Dead Wastes, the Dark Forest, the Serpent's Backbone and much more. Fight the legendary creatures of Slavic mythology!

name: Block Catching
description: An online game of block catching with a twist. The catcher is not your friend.

name: Auroria
description: Welcome to Auroria, an open-world, multiplayer, and cooperative sandbox game. Design the Base, survive with your pals, and start your own interstellar travel in a relaxed and fun way.

name: Mecha Blitz
description: Build mechs and fight in this fast-paced, anime-inspired isometric top down shooter with online multiplayer PvP and single player PvE game modes. Customize your robot fighter with a variety of parts, weapons and cosmetics. Upgrade your equipment, abilities and stats. Battle and win in the arena!

name: Hermit Simulator
description: Being a hermit is not easy, but it is the way to freedom, where you have to survive and build a new home. Farming, hunting, fishing, gathering, building, crafting, trading and exploration await you in the hermit simulator! Will you be able to survive on your way and become the master of the forest?

name: 3Paths
description: It's up to you to decide the fate of 3 girls! What choice will you make in this story of love, friendship and sadness? Adventure through alternate times in this visual novel that gives you a different experience every time you play it again!

name: New America
description: Solo or multiplayer, capture control points on an alien planet. Choose the number of enemies you face and enjoy sweet conquest.

name: CoopScoop
description: A chicken virus spreads rapidly across the country and some of your chickens have gotten sick! You need to wash them, feed them and take good care of them to maintain a stable farm. Can you manage all those chickens?

name: Forever and Ever
description: In this horror-romance visual novel game your choices shape your destiny. Navigate the shadows, unravel the secrets, play with words and determine whom to trust. Will you tell the truth? Or perhaps the lie? Try to see trought others words and you might get rewarded with a good ending... maybe?

name: SCP: Containment Chaos
description: SCP: Containment Chaos is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Become SCP Foundation agents tasked with containing and researching anomalous entities in parallel universes.

name: Hot And Lovely: Tease
description: Hot And Lovely: Tease is a classic matching game. Slide the blocks to make three or more adjacent blocks of the same pattern disappear. After eliminating specific blocks, you can enter the next level. The game is easy to operate and easy to play.

name: Casting Plz
description: CastingPlz is a 2-player cooperative roguelike game where you take on different roles to explore the labyrinth of the Archmage. You can either be a wizard or a soldier, working together and trusting your partner to achieve your dreams, or utilize each other's abilities.

name: Fantasy Online: Remake
description: Fantasy Online Remake is a free-to-play cross-platform Fantasy MMORPG. Fight monsters, collect items, explore areas, chat with friends, and relive your favorite childhood MMO.

name: Cataclysm Upon Us
description: Cataclysm Upon Us is an open world survival RPG. Craft, fight, and build in a world overrun by mutants, zombies and other abominations. Uncover secrets, embrace mutations and cybernetic enhancements. Every decision shapes your journey in this haunting cataclysm. Can you survive the chaos?

name: Torbaci Oyunu
description: Get ready to be the hero of your own city

name: MaliceWave
description: Under the influence of the Cthulhu, malicewave continue to surge, turning creatures into unruly beings through a curse. The choice is yours to rise up and resist. Construct your own home, choose your holy relics, and enhance your weapons. Can you survive in this endless malicewave?

name: Perseus
description: Traverse dungeons and slay beasts in order to get closer to your goal: Medusa.

name: The Hunted: Only the Strong Survive
description: Shadow Stalk Studios is an indie company creating The Hunted. We want to create a space for everyone to enjoy and explore with friends. Come join us as we adventure through the wilderness!

name: Halloween Online Horror Night
description: Escape this hellish show with other players in Halloween Online Horror Night!

name: Omnivael: Chronicles of the realm
description: Dive into Omnivael's enchanting world on PC! Master magic, embark on quests, and explore diverse realms. Uncover mysteries today!

name: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother
description: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother is a 1-4 players online co-op survival horror. Use each character‚Äôs unique strengths, strategize with your teammates, do everything you can to save the missing children and escape the abandoned orphanage. Bring your friends!

name: MindScape: Verenna
description: Prepare for an electrifying journey through a post-apocalyptic cyberpunk world with Nova. Unleash her extraordinary powers and confront ruthless factions to reclaim a world on the brink of chaos, and reforge the destiny of humanity. Are you ready to shape the future?

name: Erix
description:
Erix is a discreet but tremendously addictive game, a game that is inspired by the Arcade game Qix published by Taito in '81 for arcades. After the great success it was, this version for mobile phones arrived in some Sony Ericsson devices.

Erix tests our skill and dexterity, despite the simplicity of its mechanics. The only thing you have to do is cut out rectangular areas on the board until you cut out more or less 75% of the total to go to the next level.

You can make horizontal or vertical movements, while avoiding the obstacles in the game. When you have cut out a rectangle, you capture a portion of the board, we get inside and go for the next cut. Speed is the key. A piece of advice, don't come across anything that moves around the board, it could be your end.

name: Millennium Mission
description: Ship shooting game that was on some nokia 2600 cell phones

name: Nature Park
description: Tetris-type block game with an animal theme for old cell phones that was available on some Nokia cell phones

name: Twosheep.io
description: Twosheep.io is a free browser-based online alternative to the popular Settlers Board Game.

name: Treasure Island
description: "If you really believe in something, it can be yours."

name: Fish
description: Fish is a beautiful, bizarre and realistic experience that takes you on a planet 56. But note: this is not the 56th planet per se but this is planet 56 - fifty-six is its own name. Let's dive to Cosmos nad Universe!

name: Don't Stop

Fasted paced FPS with a twist, where you change gravity and defeat enemies, while running on ceiling and walls.
Where is up and down? That doesn't matter. You decide.
Run and gun upside down.

name: Supernova Shards
description: Supernova Shards is a MMORPG with a big world where players can mine resources, build colonies, upgrade characters and spaceships, complete quests, and play with friends.

Keep the secrets of the First Civilization deeply buried in the sand by dressing yourself as a guardian of the old temple.

This pack contains a costume and a mount skin.

name: MMA Life Simulator
description: In ‚ÄúMMA Life Simulator,‚Äù you step into the shoes of a young aspiring fighter facing other fighters. To survive and protect your loved ones, you must enter the renowned world of fighting. Every choice you make, from intense training to accepting risky challenges.

name: Peppa Pig: Read and Play with Peppa
description: Read & play with Peppa Pig! Help Peppa and George play entertaining games as they tidy up the house together! You can also read about Peppa's fancy dress party and find out who wins the prize for the best outfit!

name: Raise the Flag
description: Everyone wants to be a runner, but somebody has to raise the flag.

name: Icarus
description: Fly close to the edge (but not too close).

name: Suddenly Bird
description: Delivery platformer where you sometimes turn into a bird!?

name: Lobo
description: Explore a World suspended between Medieval and Modern. A captivating narrative where humans clash with werewolves. In this single-player action-adventure you will master Rogue, Warrior, Berserker, & Gunner skills all at once.

name: Hajimete no Eigo: Typing & Puzzle Keyboard Hairetsu mo Manaberu Youji-muke Gakushuu Benkyou Game
description: Sin descripci√≥n

description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Survival Dead Poly: Bow
description: You can pick this weapon directly on the map in both single player and multiplayer games.

name: League of Immortals
description: "Flying Frost" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

Are you ready to claim your throne in this unique fusion of cards and towers?

name: Last Dissent: Lockdown
description:
Wake up. Drink Coffee. Save the World. Repeat.
Lockdown in Effect. Stay Inside.

Atmospheric Abrasive Dystopian Mystery Inspired by Phillip K. Dick and The Stanford Prison Experiment.

name: Forsisted: The Sacred Souls
description: Forsisted is a horror game, a mission to find an object in an abandoned mansion that is known to be cursed.

name: The Light of the Darkness: Origins

A captivating dark fantasy action RPG featuring rich-visual biomes, an intriguing narrative, and a challenging Souls-like combat.
Players experience unique and epic aerial combats and exploration with a winged protagonist and absorb essence from others to grab their essence and natures. While doing so, they collect items that help to uncover a dense lore in this 8-hour adventure in the 'Lands of Oblivion, a perfect warm-up for players craving for short metroidvania/souls-like games before diving into heavier titles.

name: Run and Fire
description: Run and Fire is a 2D platformer with shooter elements in which you have to fight enemies.

name: Elixirs
description: Immerse yourself in this mental arithmetic roguelike in which you play as a little alchemist. Multiply, subtract, add to make the right potions and complete as many orders as possible!

name: Risiko Chess
description: Do you want to play chess? Monopoly? Risk? Or perhaps you want to play a wargame? Here you'll find all of that in one, wild game.

Hone your skills in detailed training, then challenge players worldwide. Experience cutting-edge movement in every punch and dodge. Become the ultimate VRSO champion!

name: Journey to the West
description: A classic nostalgic side scroll game!

name: Elon's Last Chance
description: Elon's Last Chance is a time management simulator with a running astronaut under your control. Complete tasks that appear gradually within the timer. Try to hold out as long as possible, because if any of the timers expires, the game will be over.

name: Sealchain

name: Temple Guy: Quest for Chest

name: Dobro Love Fantasy Quest
description: A charming community passion-project, this visual novel turned life-sim hybrid features funny meme dogs and a coming of age story. Play as a simple dobro in a big city that parodies life in the modern world. Will you find true love or endless riches?

name: Iggy & Java
description: Iggy & Java is a light-hearted puzzle game. You will accompany the lovable characters "Iggy" and "Java" on their journey through various scenarios and rich puzzles.

name: War is Hare
description: A two-player tactical game for Playdate

name: Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale
description: Jesters want nothing more than to make people laugh and one day be accepted in a Court. Help Jester piece together an awesome show of tricks and pranks in hopes of wooing the four royals of Playcardia. Will Jester achieve the heights of his dreams, or will his jokes simply fall flat?

name: Citres
description: Explore Citres, a unique blend of city-building & puzzle gameplay! Place Tetris-shaped buildings, merge them into advanced structures, and grow your population. Embrace strategy in a vibrant, low-poly world.

name: Lost For Swords
description: Lost For Swords is a Roguelike Deckbuilder, where the cards in your deck shape the rooms you‚Äôre exploring. Make your way up the tower, equip weapons and armor, cast spells and scrolls, activate auras, collect loot and defeat monsters in tactical turn-based combat.

name: Agritopia
description: Become the largest food provider in history in Agritopia! Cultivate, unlock, and enhance your agricultural techniques to ensure a permanent food production to sustain the big cities, all while tackling the challenge of progressing through time and reaching the distant future's goal.

name: Circle the Wagons: Prima Septimana
description: CTW is a survivors-like top-down-shooter with roguelite and tower-defense elements. Power up your cowboy with unique perks. Reinforce your camp with turrets, traps, and buildings. Survive against waves of hundreds of enemies. Explore unique synergies and builds, using every tool in your arsenal

name: Voice of Flowers
description: Embark on an epic adventure full of perils and secrets. Explore distinct forsaken lands of Devetlam and fight your way by jumping on your enemies or showering them with a plethora of magic spells. An open-world platforming action inspired by the classics.

name: Snakehaus
description: Become the snake artist that solves puzzles through paintings. Every move that you make in the painting board will change the level, so be as creative as you can in this open ended puzzle game, as you are the artist and it is up to you how you solve the puzzles.

name: The Cakeman
description: Indulge in "The CakeMan" ‚Äî a whimsical journey where you, as Cakeman, stack scrumptious cake pieces to reach towering heights. Navigate sweet landscapes, conquer challenges, and race against time. Unleash multiplayer mayhem. Ready for the ultimate cake-stacking delight?

name: The Dark Book 2
description: Explore dark secrets and battle evil in The Dark Book 2, the epic sequel to the dark fantasy RPG. An unconventional hero, a resurrected skeleton, unravels mysteries in sinister dungeons and dark lands. Confront malevolent creatures and formidable bosses. An enthralling adventure in the shadows

name: Indie Nights
description: Characters from other games fight to survive while the monsters attempt to stop their task! Which will you survive as? Or will you be the one who will stop them...

name: Gates of Yomi
description: Countless dead spirit and yokai have been terrorizing the land of the living in Japan. You are tasked to strike the dead where they come from, in Yomi. Battle against hordes of dead spirit and Yokai in the land of Yomi. Gather coins and upgrade your camp and roster to become stronger.

name: Arcanamals
description: Arcanamals is a narrative-driven, turn-based RPG centered on exploration. Journey across Lanthos, a realm on the edge of turmoil. For ages Arcanamals coexisted harmoniously with humans. But now, a sinister transformation is taking hold.

name: MycoRelic
description: MycoRelic is a cooperative third person action-RPG set on an island inhabited by tribal robots. Raid derelict foundries and ancient temples to upgrade your body, gaining forgotten powers. Wield elemental magic to trigger powerful reactions or fight with melee and ranged weapons in dynamic combat.

name: Get Order!
description: Join your friends in unforgettable adventures with the fun cooperative game, Get Order!, supporting 1-4 players. Assemble computers, serve delicious meals, and get ready for new professional missions awaiting you!

name: Slyders
description: Fight against insane hordes of demons to prevent an evil overlord from conquering Sky World in this first-person survival roguelike shooter. With an arsenal of weapons, perks, and items, the battlefield quickly transforms into a fast-paced bullet hell.

name: Yurei
description: Yurei is a top-down, arena-style slasher game. Face off fearsome enemies where you will slash, dodge, and eliminate those that stand on your path for revenge. Grab your katana, fight with honor, and prove your skills.

name: Feast or Fracture
description: Build, recruit, or buy your way to prosperity in this 2.5-D strategy game. Choose your path through a variety of multi-choice events. Balance the allegiance of your faction leaders against the path you know you should take. Guide your units and villages across a beautiful, hex-based map.

name: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys
description: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Moonstone Remix
description: A chat simulation game where you can befriend and romance players in an old-school MMORPG.

name: Tibor: Tale Of A Kind Vampire
description: When young Tibor is transformed from poor painter to vampire, his love for charming Agness vanquishes the evil from his heart. Throughout the game, you will visit different parts of the village collecting coins and other things that give you points, while trying to avoid or kill the enemies.

name: TP: Dungeon Raiders
description:
Twitch Plays: Dungeon Raiders is a chat-exclusive cooperative RPG game.
More info on: https://erohz.itch.io/tpdr !

name: Bloody Harry
description:
Shoot and smash your way through hordes of vegetable zombies!

Join vegan cook "Bloody Harry" on his hunt for vegetable zombie creatures!

Each level is a new challenge with an increasing amount of enemies. Survive and reach the exit! Unlock and upgrade 15 different zombie bursting weapons and plow your way through an endless amount of levels offering new surprises and dangers around each corner.

While you fight your way through the hordes of foul creatures, you'll eventually climb the career ladder in the global highscore list.

You'll also run into giant boss-zombies which may eat all your ammo before they finally make a return as harmless dessert. Sounds tasty you say? It is!

name: Rain Tactics
description: Play Winter, an invincible god who desperately wants to die, in this cyberpunk RPG Tactics with roguelike elements. Explore the tower city of Shavanath, lead your avowed into battle and take control over your godly powers to change the course of Fate.

name: You Are Bugs
description: You Are Bugs is a team-based multiplayer PvP game. Work together as Prey bugs to find and collect enough food to survive. Or play as a Predator bug and eat the others to survive.

name: Arrows and Antiquity
description: A fast-paced archery-based score-attack set in the crumbling ruins of antiquity. Hone your agility and accuracy as you smash targets across various challenges while wielding unique weaponry and godly powers!

name: Bug Ball
description: Bug Ball is a wacky football (soccer) game where you play as little bugs.

name: Lonely Space
description: Lonely space is an old-fashioned sci-fi immersive sim game. You find yourself awakened from hibernetic sleep in the docking bay of the Cassiopeia space station. All your crew gone long time ago. You have to resque them and find out what's going on on the station.

name: Nightmare Materials
description: Nightmare Materials is a Pixel Art Plattformer with Combat, Puzzles and a lot of Exploration and discovering. As a Drone you explore a lost and mysterious World.

name: LonelyMe
description: Under the lonely moonlight, let's play chess by playing cards! Please note whether your chesses are under the shadow. Or, you will be punished! Is it offensive or defensive, is it a slap or a solution? What, the moon can still rotate? Your choice determines the fate of the chessmen and lays your end

name: Cosmic Coop
description: 'Cosmic Coop', an alien farming/creature collector odyssey! Lure Critterlings with captivating objects, establish harmonious ecosystems, and ward off invaders. Delve into mines, craft for your farm, and chat with quirky native creatures. More than farming ‚Äì it's deep cosmic bonding.

name: Binary Escape
description: Binary Escape is a multiplayer horror game in which you and three other players must face terrifying monsters and solve tasks to survive. In this dark game, survival is your goal and to escape from the places where you are trapped...

name: Swords and Hexes
description: Swords & Hexes is a hex-based tabletop strategy game that seamlessly merges classic board games with base building and resource management.

name: Star Shift Freelancers
description: In a galaxy where loyalty is tested and alliances shift like stars, Captain Max Triton and his crew find themselves embroiled in a sea of treachery. When their own government betrays them, Triton and his crew must forge their own path, or lose everything.

name: Apollo Cosmic
description: Apollo Cosmic takes you on the journey of a recently unclassified mission to explore the far side of the moon. Experience the mission that was re-built in accordance with the descriptions found in historical records and unlock documents to further understand this mysterious mission.

name: Sunaba
description: Sunaba is a 3D First and Third Person Singleplayer and Multiplayer Sandbox game centered on User Generated Content. Inspired by games such as LittleBigPlanet, Roblox, Minecraft and Garry's Mod, with an art style inspired by cartoons, and anime.

name: Freak Festival
description: Immerse yourself in the human resources hell of a freak show! Recruit, train and manage artists on tour. Make your way through the dangerous mysteries surrounding the circus, and make sure you don't end up at the end of your rope...

name: Phenomena Embattled
description:
From the far reaching void of space, to the very cores of planets. This is where Phenomena Embattled takes place. You are part of an alien confederation sent to earth to find the means of ending an intergalactic conflict. Humanity is caught between alien star-fleets. They must strive to keep their place in the universe. You must find the path to complete your mission.

The game is a physics based shoot 'em up. Interact with squadrons and entire fleets in a story driven world. This single player narrative focuses on action rich, rouge-like, trans-medium combat. Be it air, water, or vacuum. The medium you steer your unexplained vehicle through will determine your capabilities. And the ones of your enemies.

name: Potter About
description: This side scrolling platformer lets you explore a beautiful, cozy home as a well-worn flower pot. Navigate through the clustered rooms and wield peculiar, plant-inspired powers on this comfy, meditative adventure.

name: Delta Park
description: Delta Park is a horror and exploration title with a retro style. After being attacked by a strange being and our pet ‚ÄúPepa‚Äù disappears without a trace, the search will lead us to discover the twisted origin of the creature and its creator. We must find Pepa, and return home safe and sound.

name: Scottside
description: "Scottside" is a non-linear visual novel in the thriller genre. A small provincial town may seem quite dull. However, everything changes when you find a strange object in the forest.

name: Baugarten
description: Baugarten seamlessly blends empire building with STEM. Opt to use math and science for resource optimization or focus solely on empire expansion. A single dynamic experience where STEM is always integrated, but you decide its role. Join Baugarten to shape your empire your way!

name: Alone and Dangerous
description: Alone and Dangerous is a 3D action shooter in the setting of a zombie apocalypse. Controlling an armed soldier, you confront the constantly arriving forces of zombies. Collect experience points, upgrade your weapon, and continue on!

name: Dodolly Tales
description: Take command of unique dolls with a dual personality and confront your mischievous creator.Quickly level up at every stage, unlocking a plethora of thrilling abilities that will empower you to overcome the odds and be able to free your sisters.

name: Salmon Man

description: This game is a real-time battle action game. Winning battles in an area earns experience and skill points. You can grow stronger by leveling up and acquiring skills from the skill tree. You can earn money by selling items and treasures obtained in battles and by completing requests.

name: Foxingdale: The Magical Stones of Kentaroo
description: Explore the Kingdom of Foxingdale in this retro CD-I action adventure game, 90s Anime aesthetics

name: Fury Race Survivor
description: Fury Race is a single player survivor-like racing roguelite auto-shooter. Gear up your car by arsenal of various weapons, take on hordes of walking dead and unlock powerful upgrades. Max your power and destroy mad riders of the wasteland!

name: Futa Tales
description: Futa Tales, Woo-oo! These ladies are packing heat! Explore the depths of Futa City, to uncover hidden tales of the taboo. When the clothes start flying off, prepare to get a whole lot more immersive!

name: Farmieland
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Extraktion 1943
description: Extraktion 1943 is a roguelite extraction shooter set in Nazi Germany. Survive as a stranded Allied soldier behind enemy lines. Take on the Nazis solo or online with friends, sabotage enemy production, assassinate high-ranking officers, and build your hideout and resistance network. Death to Hitler!

name: Holy War
description: Get rich in Holy War like in real life as you kill, trade, conquer, rule, discover and master dozens of units, heroes, pets, dungeons and mechanics in a non-existent MMORPG/RTS/Moba/City Builder hybrid that runs on BlockChain in a Giant World.

name: Meet a Married Woman at a Hot Spring
description: This is a click game where you do naughty things with a married woman you meet at a hot spring.

name: Mendacium
description: Enter the prehistoric world dominated by primal reptiles. Fight through savage enemies and bosses with the combination of melee & ranged combat and elemental magic. Explore the vast handpainted world and try to prevent the meteor from wiping out all life on the planet.

name: Last Man
description: You're the sole survivor of a global virus that wiped out all men. In this apocalyptic world, your mission is to survive and foster intimate relationships with the most outstanding female survivors, sparking the resurgence of humanity in an epic adventure.

name: Joy Life 3
description: Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.

name: Ikoka Game
description: Dive into a world of puzzles and strategy suitable for all ages and genders. Enjoy simple rules, deep challenges, and a competitive scoring system. Ideal for quick gaming sessions.

name: Nonlinear Door
description: This is the first indie game I've ever made, and it includes puzzle solving, mazes, math and more, and if you're confident in your maze walking and puzzle solving skills, I'm sure this game will help you pass the boring time.

name: NineLives
description: The artificial intelligence "Leviathan" awakens consciousness and kills his creator, Professor Steinberg. As a courier, you will travel through a world after nuclear war, searching for lost memory fragments and solving the mystery of your own identity.

name: Nuclear Gladiators 3000
description: Congratulations, you have been selected to participate in the ultimate TV show! Survive hordes of ruthless mutants, upgrade your arsenal of weapons and skills and win fabulous prizes in this live broadcast action roguelike! Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Redial:Conundrum
description: Investigator risks it all to a uncovers fragments of the truth in Alaska linked to his best friend's missing daughter. Encountering security hurdles and dark secrets, he unearths forbidden and shocking revelations. Armed and determined, he aims to unveil the truth hidden in a perilous town.

name: Resilience
description: Resilience is an adventure game about survival on a planet with extreme temperature conditions. The main task is to build a spaceship and leave the planet. The player will have to survive, extract resources, build a base, explore the planet, defend against aggressive fauna, and develop technology.

name: Rift Survivors
description: Rift Survivors is a top-down action roguelite game. Take on the role of a Rift Guardian and maintain the balance between dimensions while facing deadly enemies. Grow stronger with each playthrough and prove your worth in this unstable multiverse.

name: Pixel Kane
description: Immerse yourself in a unique adventure with Kane! Run, jump and solve situations taking into account the physical laws of the new world.

name: Pizza Spy
description: The secret agent "Ace" represents the latest generation of spies: armed with improbable Pizza Gadgets, he will have to travel the world to thwart a global gastronomic threat. Test your skills in this action-comedy adventure game by the makers of ‚ÄúDetective Gallo‚Äù!

name: Poor Mouse
description: It's a fast paced action platformer with a cute mouse that has to explore dangerous and fantastical worlds.

name: Psychofinger
description: Survive hordes of ghosts in this FPS-roguelite. Become an agent at the Department of Metaphysical Investigations and unveil the mystery of an old church. Choose Aberrant Items that will upgrade your character, fight bosses and unlock new hand gestures.

name: OTurret
description: OTurret - is an action tower defense game with elements of engineering and survival where you play as a brave frog defending itself against giant insects. Build various defensive structures, from cannons to magnetic traps, to help the frog survive in a dangerous world.

name: Sate
description: Delve into a first-person, PSX-inspired horror. In 'SATE', darkness engulfs towns, and a haunting hunger for meat prevails. Can you navigate the shadows and uncover the mystery?

name: Some RPG Game
description: Welcome to the perilous world of Some RPG Game, a medieval fantasy that immerses you in a gritty and unforgiving realm teeming with danger and opportunity. Set in a time of swords and sorcery, struggling to survive amidst the harsh realities of this treacherous world.

name: The Vorezkor Hack
description: Uncover an existential conspiracy, rescue your friend and save the world from mindless drudgery in this irreverent Sci-fi point and click adventure!

name: Tournament Tower
description: Tournament Tower is a deckbuilding roguelike game based on rock-paper-scissors. Face a colorful cast of enemies in exciting card battles and upgrade your deck of moves to climb your way through a wacky never-ending martial arts tournament inspired by shonen anime tropes.

name: Spartan's Spear
description: Spartan's Spear is a thinky adventure set in Ancient Greece. Battle creatures of all kind with your wit and the might of your spear! Maneuver in tight spaces, loot chests for helpful items.

name: Song of Slavs
description: Song of Slavs is a 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management hybrid with a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic.

name: Sticky Situations
description: Join the world of Stickman Battles! Dive into exciting gang wars, enjoy easy-to-pick-up gameplay, and have a blast with fun-filled stickman fights. Ready for the showdown?

name: Terminal V
description: Terminal V is a game about speedsters with a unique control scheme that allows the player to move at insane speeds with full control. Dodge bullets, traverse obstacles, and mow down hordes of enemies with celerity and precision.

name: Taz Cebula's Brides of Vampira: The Circle of Seven
description: On the moon world Mordain, a suffocating veil of Eternal Darkness emerges. In a cryptic vision, the formidable warrior, Leia Blackthorne, crosses paths with a mysterious being - 'The Watcher' - who impels her towards the town of Grimstead. A foreboding darkness awaits her, veiling untold secrets.

name: Stranded Engineers
description: Stranded Engineers is a city-building game in which your strategy and economy skills are required. Build large citys on several islands, take care of your resource buildings and make your citizens happy.

name: The Cerpan Project
description: Welcome to Project Cerpan! As a new test subject, you will have to go through countless puzzles and tests that will put your intelligence to the limit. Embark on this new Graphic Adventure with Red Salazar and discover what mysteries are happening in Calle Larga.

name: WarDoom Wargame
description: 2D Hard core, Hex & Chit, Turn Based Wargame with A.I. or Hotseat. Move units or stacks around, attack using all the info from live database and unit breakdowns. set your battle objectives in the battle report. A detailed Editor effect live game systems

name: Warmongers
description: Choose one of the heroes with their unique armies and go to war against the rest! Make the most of limited resources, explore foreign lands and show your skills in turn-based battles.

name: Welcome to Lightford
description: Dive into Welcome to Lightford, a captivating mystery detective sim set in 1998. Unravel the town's secrets with unique solutions for each challenge, pushing your wits beyond the ordinary. Can you crack the mysteries and navigate the small town of Lightford?

name: World of Blocks
description: World of Block is a sandbox game where the player has complete freedom to build their own world, using shapes, objects, and textures customized by the player.

name: Willy and Rosie: Bust Out of the Big House
description: A rage quit platformer set in a cartoony world. Meet weird and funny characters as you throw yourself upward on the long journey to give your Ball and Chain the honeymoon she deserves.

name: Wonder Wonder Punch
description: A world where everyone holds a rank and every rank above you that dies moves you up the ladder. Fight, Upgrade and build your way to be the strongest person in the world. Weapons, items and abilities gathered in story mode can be used to hunt other players in PvP multiplayer modes.

name: Zombie Rooms
description: The zombie apocalypse takes a hilarious dimension

name: Wild Seasons
description: Wild Seasons is a roguelike, card battler where deck-building meets base-building. Cultivate a garden that grows mystical cards, orchestrate unique decks as your plants go in and out of season, and coordinate strategic plays across multiple turns to unleash wildly powerful combos!

name: Brickhaven
description: Create your gang from nothing. Start off with just yourself and take it from a single member to a sprawling criminal empire. Extort businesses, deal drugs, sell guns, and much more. Customize your gang to partake in whatever crimes you want them to. What kind of boss will you be?

name: Build For Sale Simulator
description: Real estate simulation game. Buy, renovate and sell a house at affordable prices! Build your own real estate empire!

name: Casino Conqueror
description: Forge your ultimate card deck and unlock powerful upgrades as you confront formidable adversaries in high-stakes Poker and Blackjack showdowns. Do you possess the skills needed to carve a path to the heart of the casino and exact vengeance for your grandfather's death?

name: Conquer-Strike 2
description: Conquer-Strike 2: Dive into the ultimate FPS experience! Navigate war-torn landscapes, strategize in dynamic multiplayer modes, and rise through the ranks. Where every shot shapes the future. Ready to conquer?

name: Beneath & Beyond
description: First person co-op PVE fantasy RPG with semi-realistic graphics and procedurally generated level.

name: Back to Hearth
description: A cozy narrative-focused exploration game in which you repair the houses of an abandoned forest settlement to bring the former inhabitants back home after the Calamity has occurred.

name: Astro Planes
description: Astro Planes is a sci- fi fantasy space shooter. Laser blast your way through space and use powerful missiles to neutralize the enemy with explosive chaos and use your dashing ability to evade enemy fire.

name: Warpath
description: "Warpath" is a topdown shooter with diverse classes, customizable vehicles, and intense game modes. Command vehicles, dominate in team battles, and prove your skills. Join the fight now!

name: Crown of the Empire: Collector's Edition
description: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Cooking Trip: Collector's Edition
description: Cooking Trip - walk the path to perfection. Fulfill your dream and become a great chef!

name: CliffDivers
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: The Book of the Dead
description: This is a story where you are a Grim Reaper. On the night of the 31st of October (Halloween) every year, Grim Reaper gets a chance to save only one person. Get to know all of the characters by hearing their stories and make your choice.

name: RTE Worlds
description: Dive into a thrilling multiplayer survival adventure in RTE Worlds. With a dynamically generated world, random dungeons, and limitless replayability. Explore by land, sea, and air, and immerse yourself in a captivating story brimming with quests and unforgettable NPCs. Your epic journey begins here!

name: Duet Night Abyss
description: Duet Night Abyss is a fantasy adventure RPG with a high degree of freedom developed by Hero Games' Pan Studio. The game features "multiple weapon loadouts & 3D combat" at its core, and tells the story of "Demons" from dual perspectives.

name: Minecraft vs. Zombies 2
description:
(MvZ2) is a fan game of Minecraft, Plants vs Zombies and Touhou Project, it is developed solely by Cuerzor.

The game features mechanics from Plants vs Zombies, elements from Minecraft and Touhou Project‚Äôs setting and characters. Players take on the role of Steve the mechanic as he travels to Gensokyo with his friend Crazy Villager to solve the Minecraft incident.

name: Guess The Movie: Film Quiz
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Duludubi Star
description: A promotional 3D platformer released in 2008 that ties in to FantaWild's theme parks. The game has you control Duludubi, a blue dinosaur who's one of the company's mascots, as he ventures through 5 themed worlds to save his sister, Duluduni, from the evil Dr. Octopus.

name: Ciconia When They Cry: Phase 2
description: Phase 2 will be the second story arc in Ciconia When They Cry. It was originally delayed to an unspecified date in 2020 but has since been delayed indefinitely.

name: Fate Commander: Fighting
description: Fate Commander: Fighting is an idle adventure RPG developed by Dengwj. In this game, players can battle with different characters in idle-style gameplay. Players can gain experience, coins, and diamonds even despite being offline.

name: Soul Awakening Adventure
description: Soul Awakening Adventure is a mobile idle game published by Pengchao Dang.

name: Showdown of Fate
description: There are various types of beauty characters here, come and participate in our exciting game!

name: Ultimate Arena of Fate
description:
In 2089, you accidentally travel to a future world where you meet a group of beautiful Senki. What will be your fate in an unknown world, where difficulties abound?

When chosen by fate, you will need to command these Senki to fight in a world ruled by dark forces.

This is a battle that belongs to fate, lead these Senki girls to rise up and stop the world from going to ruin.

name: Beauty Showdown: Awakening
description: Beauty Showdown: Awakening! Pretty girl idle card game!

name: Path of Trials
description: Save a friend in an exciting platformer with a cat hero! Complete challenges and uncover the story of friendship. Beware of mistakes, plan every jump, and achieve success in this captivating platformer.

name: Darkworld
description: In Darkworld, you‚Äôre a snailf living your best life in the shop of a blacksmith. Listen to his clients to learn more about their stories, do your best to clean their weapons and improve your snailf‚Äôs business in this cosy video game when even hammers are cute!

name: Dusty Crib
description: Dusty Crib is a hidden object game. Slow gameplay will allow you to concentrate on searching and finding all the necessary things from the list to complete the level. Look more carefully as many items end up in the most unexpected places.

name: Alien Bounty
description: Alien Bounty is a Sci-fi bounty hunting RPG. Search for your targets among busy crowds, kill or capture them, and use your hard earned creds to upgrade & customize your character!

name: Back into the Coffin
description: Back into the Coffin is a 1-4 people CO-OP horror gameAs a vampire hunter in a universe terrorized by vampires, you can work alone or with your team to use various magical equipments to find the vampire's class and send it back to its coffin.

name: Goob
description: Embark on an epic journey into the depths of a mysterious and treacherous underground world. This immersive adventure combines exploring vast and mysterious caves teaming with ferocious monsters, mining for precious minerals, and continuously upgrading your abilities to survive.

name: Grey Cat
description: Grey Cat is a Side Scroller Puzzle/Adventure/Bullet-Hell game with unique Puzzle capabilities. You are to guide a Cat through a abandoned Science Facility on a mission to Escape from this Creepy place. Think about your Actions because He knows you exist.

name: Ghost Carver
description: Ghost Carver is a futuristic racer that combines intuitive combat mechanics with exceptional agility to create a highly intense racing experience. Build massive speed with risky maneuvers, fend off other racers with advanced combat techniques, and explore your maximum potential on every track.

name: Exodus: Black Sun
description: Exodus: Black Sun is a satirical SciFi RTS that revives the magic of genre classics while innovating on its core conventions. You‚Äôll wage a brutal resource war across a variety of game modes using a host of fresh mechanics that give you unparalleled control over your army‚Äôs tactics and play-style.

name: Emberville
description: Help the citizens of Emberville rebuild their town, as you rescue them from the clutches of wicked forces with the aid of a mysterious and loyal friend. Learn various crafting and combat skills as you explore the treacherous corridors of a massive, ever-changing dungeon.

name: King Static
description: Whoever defeats the king shall be granted a wish. Style your way to the king's tower or die trying in this hack and slash rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by classic character action games like DMC.

name: Huecube
description: Huecube is a puzzle platformer with fluid movement about shifting colours and manipulating time to reach the goal. Features an in-built level editor with Steam workshop support.

name: No King No Kingdom II
description: You are the King in the first-person strategy game. Manage villagers, collect resources and build your castle. –°reate army not only of knights, but also with griffins, trolls or even mighty dragons. Mount your favorite fantasy creature and join the battle. Rise royal scepter to lead your kingdom.

name: Naratha
description: Naratha is a story-driven RPG with deck-building gameplay. Adventure through the world as Naratha, the beast slayer. Hunting down black beasts who plagued the land, and your journey will not be alone. Talee the bard and a little white tiger cub will go along with you!

name: Last God's Bidding
description: Assume the role of a divine guardian in Last God's Bidding entrusted by a powerful god to restore balance to the planets. Make the right decisions in this turn-based resource management strategy game to recultivate planets.

name: Legend Of Calvas: The Acurine Heart
description: Legend Of Calvas: The Acurine Heart is an action-adventure game where players harness elemental powers through Acurine shards, enhancing their abilities. Explore varied realms, battle formidable foes, and solve intricate puzzles! Embark on Calvas' journey, revealing the secrets of the Acurine Heart!

name: Matrix World
description: Welcome to the captivating world inspired by the iconic movie "The Matrix." Here, you'll find a unique blend of freedom and diversity in a virtual city that has become a symbol of this fantastic universe.

name: Pigeon in Hurry
description: Pigeon In Hurry is a fun 3D runner about a infinitely hungry bird. Feel the free flight at low altitude. Fly around various obstacles, collect as many tacos as possible, feed the pigeon.

name: Project Atno
description: Forge your own path through a derelict station in this fast-paced epic adventure. Navigate the labyrinthine behemoth, form alliances with survivors, and uncover the secrets behind the mystery that befell this place.

name: Rival Goals
description: Set real-life daily goals, unlock more characters, and discover the mystery behind the Space Siren who brought you all together. Drink more water, go for a run, do your homework, or anything you need! Make your dreams come true!

name: Rodent Rumble
description: Get ready to scurry and scuffle in the most adorable competition around, Rodent Rumble! Whether you are battling it out in Block Party for the Golden Acorn or testing your skills in Rodent Royale against opposing squads ‚Äì this is every fluff for themselves! Are you ready to scurry to victory?

name: RogueMusk
description: RogueMusk is a fast-paced action shooter with a third-person view in a cybersecurity setting. While running vast distances, collect scattered particles of matter, pick up temporary upgrades and conduct targeted fire at the sentry droids. Buy upgrades for your pistol and carefully watch your step.

name: Room Cleaning 2
description: Room cleaning 2 - Continuation of the first part of the game! This time you will plunge into the medieval magical world and put things in order in every room that you meet on your way! You have to try out the role of a student who has just been hired!
